name: night train (itch) (battlestarvalk)
description:
It is almost midnight- wait, no- it is midnight. Midnight exactly has struck, and you are on a platform. It’s lit by a single light, illuminating the few figures on the platform with you. You can’t quite make out their faces, but are they familiar? Maybe they are. You call out to them, but none respond. You, after all, are a mysterious figure in the mist to them as well.

A train is arriving. You suppose you should get on it. The carriage you board is empty, except for one - a mysterious figure, sat at a table. You suppose you should join them, after all, they seem inviting enough.

It’s time to take the night train. And when the sun rises in a few short hours, it will be time for you to move on.

night train is a gmless rpg for two players. you'll need a pack of cards.

Submitted for the folklorejam, with my biggest thanks for a deadline extension. This game with remain PWYW for the duration of the jam. A plain text version will remain free, forever.

Give me a shout on twitter @battlestarvalk with questions, comments, or suggestions!
